name: phplist
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: phplist is the world's most popular open source email campaign manager.

matches.text: You probably want to be here or here.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<span class="urhere">phplist powered by <\/span><a class="urhere" href="http:\/\/www\.phplist\.com" target="_blank">phplist<\/a> - version ([^<]+)<\/td>)
